6 AngleServer::AngleServer(const char* s_topic, int sq_size)
7 {
8  sub_ = nh_.subscribe(s_topic,sq_size,&AngleServer::callback,this);
9  server_ = nh_.advertiseService("rotor_pos/angle",&AngleServer::sendAngle,this);
10 }

12 void AngleServer::callback(const remote_robotics::MotorImg& msg)
13 {
14  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
15 
16  //ROS_INFO("%i\n",msg.INDEX); //debugging
17 
18  try
19  {
20  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg.IMG,"mono8");
21  }
22  catch(cv_bridge::Exception& e)
23  {
24  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s\n",e.what());
25  return;
26  }
27 
28  try
29  {
30  if((msg.INDEX < 0) || (msg.INDEX > 23))
31  throw std::string("motor index out of bounds in member function callback()");
32 
33  angles[msg.INDEX] = getAngle(cv_ptr->image);
34 
35  }
36  catch(std::string e)
37  {
38  ROS_INFO("%s\n",e.c_str());
39  }
40 
41  return;
42 }

45 bool AngleServer::sendAngle(remote_robotics::rotor_angle::Request& req,
46  remote_robotics::rotor_angle::Response& res)
47 {
48  if((req.INDEX < 0) || (req.INDEX > 23))
49  {
50  res.ANGLE = -361;
51  return true;
52  }
53 
54  res.ANGLE = static_cast<int>(angles[req.INDEX]);
55  return false;
56 }

58 AnglePublisher::AnglePublisher(const char* s_topic, int sq_size, const char* p_topic, int pq_size)
59 {
60  sub_ = nh_.subscribe(s_topic,sq_size,&AnglePublisher::callback, this);
61  pub_ = nh_.advertise<remote_robotics::RotorAngle>(p_topic,pq_size);
62 }
63 
64 void AnglePublisher::callback(const remote_robotics::MotorImg& msg)
65 {
66  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
67  remote_robotics::RotorAngle angle_msg;
68 
69  //ROS_INFO("%i\n",msg.INDEX); //debugging
70 
71  try
72  {
73  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg.IMG,"mono8");
74  }
75  catch(cv_bridge::Exception& e)
76  {
77  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s\n",e.what());
78  return;
79  }
80 
81  try
82  {
83  angle_msg.ANGLE = static_cast<int>(getAngle(cv_ptr->image));
84  angle_msg.INDEX = msg.INDEX;
85 
86  pub_.publish(angle_msg);
87  }
88  catch(std::string e)
89  {
90  ROS_INFO("%s\n",e.c_str());
91  }
92 
93  return;
94 }
95 
96 double AngleDetector::getAngle(cv::Mat& bin)
97 {
98  if(!isBinary(bin))
99  throw std::string("Image container isn't binary");
100  cv::Moments m = moments(bin,true);
101  double a = m.mu20;
102  double b = m.mu11;
103  double c = m.mu02;
104 
105  double theta = atan2(b, a-c)/2.0;
106 
107  // return minus theta since the algorithm is counting the angle clockwise
108  return -theta*180/PI;
109 }
110 
111 bool AngleDetector::isBinary(cv::Mat& m)
112 {
113  if(m.channels()>1)
114  return false;
115  int i,j;
116  for(i = 0; i < m.rows; i++)
117  for(j = 0; j < m.cols; j++)
118  if(!((m.at<uchar>(i,j) == 0) || (m.at<uchar>(i,j) == 255)))
119  return false;
120  return true;
121 }
